biotools.summary:
A Python toolkit for uploading images and metadata to OMERO.

Code snipets for updating whole properties of whole ISA tree, for example permissions settings.

When building a distribution for release through BioConda, the Python setuptools are used.

Library of artifacts for integration with Seek4Science using Seek's REST API.

Example data, notebooks and scripts for demonstrating features of OMEROConnect and pyOmeroUpload.
